p: A total amount of 264.97 MB from the 35 fecal samples were sequenced, once reads were finally stabilized. Sequences were trimmed and filtered, leaving a final sum of 393958 (540â€“555 nt of mean length). After performing the blast search, reads were grouped in taxa according to different taxonomical levels, with a final output of 10 phyla, 82 families, 223 genera, and 513 species.
